attributes.action: istitute conditions before anyone can be come a member of parliment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: a person must have 10yrs experience in commerce or industry    must have lived in the area for 3yrs if he becomes an mp he must reside in the area whilst he is the mp  no person shall be an mp for more than 10yrs

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
